author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
I got a warning from the Registrator about the version number.

I've set the version number to `v0.4.1` because it matches `ApplicationBuilder`'s version number. But I can also see the reasoning that these are two separate packages, so they should have two separate number. As an example, i'm probably not going to make a commit to this package every time I update ApplicationBuilder...

I'm interested in guidance here if anyone has an opinion? Otherwise I think i'm happy to just merge it as-is.

Please close this PR in favor of #401.

NOTE: I excepted calling `register()` a second time to update this PR instead of opening a new one... i think i followed the instructions correctly, but it actually opened a new PR. This was the note from the Regsitrator:

> This can be safely ignored. However, if you want to fix this you can do so. Call register() again after making the fix. This will update the Pull request.
